snippet.title: Soldier of Empire Gameplay Part 1 no Commentary
snippet.description:
Soldier of the Empire - first-person shooter that puts the main character in a not-so-simple, even somewhat absurd situation from which he must find a way out. Soldier of the Empire's gameplay does not let you relax for a second. The story begins with a soldier letting himself get drunk before tomorrow's battle. As a result, he is sent to the brig for breaking the rules. Waking up to the alarm, he realizes that the battle has already been lost - he overslept it.

At the same time comrades in a hurry leave the battle space shuttle, which is crumbling right in front of your eyes. Panic erupts all around, explosions rumble, the commander is hysterical and gives completely unthinkable orders. Empire Soldier has only a wrist switch and a weak taser to scratch your ass with. With this gentleman's kit you will survive this nightmare.

The story campaign consists of 13 exciting and dynamic levels, during which you will have to fight with various enemies. A total of 7 types of enemies are represented. Everyone has their own unique attacks and abilities. Fight through 10 different kinds of guns, unlocking guns as you go. In addition to single player, there are 5 multiplayer maps and 2 online modes: classic and team deathmatch.

YEAR: 2004
PLATFORM: Windows
RELEASED IN: United States
GENRE: Action
THEME: FPS, Sci-Fi / Futuristic, Shooter
PUBLISHER: Russobit-M
DEVELOPER: Fragmaker
PERSPECTIVE: 1st-Person
